items.summary: Add a site-wide promotional banner across the very top of the app (above the existing sticky header navigation) that displays the exact message: "We have a startup assistance program called ANC Apprentice Program Center if your interested set an appointment today at : https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services". The banner must include a clickable link to https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services (open in a new tab).

Add a button directly below the banner advertisement (as part of the same top-of-page banner area) labeled exactly: "Connect with the appointment dashboard53". When clicked, it must navigate the user to a new in-app page/route for the appointment dashboard ("Appointment Dashboard53").

Create the "Appointment Dashboard53" page/route and render an embedded view of the Calendly scheduling page https://calendly.com/anc-electronics-n-services (e.g., via an iframe) along with a clear external-link fallback that opens the same URL in a new tab.
